articles.title: Indian stock market: 8 key things that changed for market overnight - Gift Nifty, US jobless claims to oil price rally | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian stock market: Asian markets traded lower, while US stock market indices ended sharply lower overnight after comments from US Federal Reserve officials raised worries that the central bank could hold off on rate cuts.
articles.content: Indian stock market: The Indian equity market indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are expected to open lower on Friday following weakness in global markets and as investors watch out for the Reserve Bank o… [+5729 chars]
